Simon Cowell for Glee character The 50-year-old actress- who plays scathing cheerleading coach Sue Sylvester on the US TV show- believes there are many similarities between the teacher and the straight-talking talent show judge. She said: If ever there was a guy who tells it like it is, then it's Simon Cowell . You could definitely look at Sue and say there's a lot of Simon Cowell in her." He's a great inspiration for the character of Sue- there is a lot that I can take from him and put into her. I came this morning to the Egyptian Museum and found that some had tried to raid the museum by force last night," Zahi Hawass , chairperson of the Supreme Council of Antiquities, said on Saturday. Egyptian citizens tried to prevent them and were joined by the tourism police, but some( looters) managed to enter from above and they destroyed two of the mummies, he said. The next step is to reduce U.S. unemployment, an issue Barack Obama should make" the centerpiece" of his annual State of the Union address on Jan. 25, the former Cabinet member said. The American people are expecting him to say something about what he's going to do to keep the economy moving forward, Colin Powell said. Colin Powell has criticized his own party in recent months while supporting Barack Obama 's ultimately successful fight for Senate ratification of a new nuclear-arms-reduction treaty with Russia.
